description: NYMB is a long-established bathroom accessories brand. We have been producing and selling shower curtains, bath mats and tapestries for many years. Each pattern is carefully selected by the designer, in order to bring extra spark to our dear customer's bathroom and life.

Made of 100-percent polyester fabric. Coordinates effortlessly with surrounding decors. Transform any bath into an elegant spa-like oasis with fabric shower curtain.Environment-Friendly: We use high quality eco-friendly ink for printing, there is no toxic or odors (better than the PVC, vinyl or plastic shower curtains).Providing a safe and healthy environment for you and your family.Our unique & modern designs match well with various color palettes of towels, rugs, bathroom mats and any other bathroom accessories

1 Don’t bleach or tumble dry.2 Machine wash cold or wipe clean with a damp cloth.3 Due to differences in computer monitors display, there can be color variations between the actual product and your screen.4 Product sizes that measured by hand lead to the difference between about 1-2 Inch due to everyone’s measurement technique.
If you are not satisfied with the item, please contact us in time, we will provide you with quality service 24 hours a day.Until your question ends satisfactorily
